text: Feeling like I ve crossed a threshold About a year ago I started having severe acid reflux and it has gradually turned my life into a living hell  It might sound like something manageable but I ve racked up   worth of medical bills trying to find out what s wrong with my stomach  At this point I am bed ridden most of the day  I ve gone through my savings  sold everything of value and have been living without running water for months  The pain in my stomach while I am typing this is almost unbearable  If I had a gun I know with certainty I would kill myself right this moment  I have gone through twelve doctors  two gastroenterologists and a mental health psychiatrist  After having done every test known to medical science every single one of them cannot come to any type of conclusion because they can t see anything wrong with me  I ve actually had doctors lean in and tell me I might have a mental health issue  I went to the ER today for the eighth time this month and they literally rolled their eyes at me and did nothing  I can barely move the pain is so severe and even breathing in hurts  I can t see myself getting out of this hole  I lay in bed and fantasize about jumping off the bridge by my apartment almost every night  The sad thing is if it wasn t for this hopeless pain I wouldn t want to die  I just can t live with this pain  I can t even have lettuce and water without my stomach bloating and hurting  I can t go on with this any longer
summary: A year ago I started having severe acid reflux and it has turned my life into a living hell. I have gone through a lot of money trying to find out what's wrong with my stomach. I went to the ER today for the eighth time this month. I fantasize about jumping off the bridge every night.
cleaned: year ago start have severe acid reflux turn life live hell go lot money try find wrong stomach go today eighth time month fantasize jump bridge night

text: Depression is a tease Depression  It s such a tease  You get these highs  It comes back with ease   You wake up everyday  You beg and you beg  Let today be the day  I turn my life around please   As the money gets lower  The debts get higher  The oxygen runs out  And so does the fire   You re left there  Thinking of all the moments you wish you could fix  The rooms silent  The clock ticks  There you go again  Wishing you had super powers  I mean you day dream about the shit for hours and hours   Truth is  I can t fix the past  It ll never get better  These highs they re light like a feather but these lows could rip leather and this life is the worst weather it s cold and warm never I just  Want  To be  Better   It s hard not to feel like I have a curse  It gets better  And immediately worse  Than ever before  I mean honestly  In my heart  In my mind  I know where happiness I find  It s me  Who makes me blind  I know exactly how to ease my mind  Some need meds  Some need someone to call  I  Just need to end it all   But tomorrow I ll wake up and continue with this disease  Because depression is such a tease
